name: Date Validator DD/MM/YYYY includes leap years
description: Name: Date Validator DD/MM/YYYY includes leap years (load)Author: Macs DickinsonRating: 3 / 4 (8 votes)This will match valid dates in the format DD/MM/YYYY.It takes leap years into account when matching feb 29th and covers from 01/01/0000 to 31/12/9999Pattern: ^(((0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01])[- /.](0[13578]|1[02])|(0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|30)[- /.](0[469]|11)|(0[1-9]|1\d|2[0-8])[- /.]02)[- /.]\d{4}|29[- /.]02[- /.](\d{2}(0[48]|[2468][048]|[13579][26])|([02468][048]|[1359][26])00))$
author: Name: Date Validator DD/MM/YYYY
